snippet: On Friday, Barclays announced that it had borrowed $10.9 billion from the European Central Bank, as Lloyds, HSBC and the Royal Bank of Scotland made similar moves.
abstract: On Friday, Barclays announced that it had borrowed $10.9 billion from the European Central Bank, as Lloyds, HSBC and the Royal Bank of Scotland made similar moves.

headline.main: British Banks Take Advantage of Cheap Loans
